name: hustthesis
short_description: HUST Thesis (hustthesis) is a project initiated by graduate students of Huazhong Univ. of Science and Technology (HUST), China to deliver a LaTeX template for creating Master/Ph.D thesis that conforms to format requirements specified by the university.
